mapper.select: select server_name as name,ip,cpuLoad, memSize/(1024*1024*1024) as memSize, memUsed/(1024*1024*1024) as memUsed, ROUND(memUsed/memSize*100,0) as memPercent, ROUND(diskUsed/(1024*1024*1024),2) as diskUsed, ROUND((diskSize-diskUsed)/(1024*1024*1024),2) as diskSize, ID from xhgmnet_eastcom_server
select dstId,dstName,IP as ip,flag,setupStatus,dbox_ip as dxbox_ip from xhgmnet_dispatch order by dstId asc
select COUNT(severity) as num,severity from xhgmnet_eastcom_alarminfo where `status`!=1 GROUP BY severity
select COUNT(severity) as num,severity from xhgmnet_eastcom_alarminfo where `status`=1 and DATE_FORMAT(`time`,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{time} GROUP BY severity

SELECT a.bsid, a.TotalActiveCalls, a.TotalActiveCallDuration, (select count(userId) from xhgmnet.xhgmnet_operations_userstatus where bsid=a.bsid) as regUsers, a.starttime FROM chart_day_bstotal as a WHERE TO_DAYS(a.starttime) =TO_DAYS(#{time})-1 and a.bsid in (select bsId from xhgmnet.xhgmnet_bs_important)
SELECT * FROM xhgmnet_gpsinfo_day WHERE YEARWEEK( date_format(infoTime, '%Y-%m-%d') ) = YEARWEEK(#{day});

SELECT (select `status` from xhgmnet_user_access_list where User_Name='交管局') as jg, (select `status` from xhgmnet_user_access_list where User_Name='成都市公安局GPS') as cd FROM xhgmnet_user_access_list limit 1
SELECT * FROM xhgmnet_other_device_status order by sort_num asc
